title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       2016 Concert & events calendar card  May 28-October 31, 2016: A variety of guided tours are offered daily. Check the daily program schedule at the visitor center for times. Reservations are not needed for the scheduled tours.  Sunday, June 26, Special Event - Dedication of a full-size bronze cast of the  'Standing Lincoln" monument  July 3 - August 28, The annual Summer Concert Series is held at 2:00- 4:00 PM every Sunday afternoon.   July 31, Discover Your Park Family Picnic Day Please check for any special events that may be happening during the time of your visit.    September 3, The Star Party  September 24, Sculptural Visions is celebrated on National Public Lands Day
